name: Night Land
description:
Night Land is the most mysterious and adventurous game full of excitement and competition. Try out this endless runner game and dare to get into the dangerous world. The game has a killer user interface with thrilling graphics and mysterious sound effects. All these haunting music effects and graphics gives you the shocking experience of being in a deadly world.

This deadly game never ends.

In these mysterious world you’ll encounter the horrifying obstacles that will stop you from running forward. Dare to play this mysterious endless running game in a dangerous world. Keep running and score the maximum to get yourself into the leaderboard. Compete against the top gamers in the world. With an amazing graphics and competitive game, it not only gives you a cool experience but also lets you show up your gaming skills and play against the top gamers. You can also challenge your friends or family by sharing the screenshots.

Night Land is sure to challenge you at every stage and you really need to calm yourself in order to keep moving forward with really simple controls. Just tap left side to jump and right side to roll to avoid the horrifying and mysterious obstacle that come up in your way.

So are you ready to take up this deadly challenge?

***************
FEATURES
***************

• Cool graphics with thrilling and haunting sound effects
• Deadly never ending running game
• Very simple intuitive controls
• Collect all the coins
• Mysterious game full off obstacles
• Game Center Leaderboard
• Challenge your friends and family
